title: Ticket #1190: condor_config_val tricked by empty config param value
description:
$ echo "ABC =" > config
$ CONDOR_CONFIG=config condor_config_val -dump | grep ABC
ABC =
$ CONDOR_CONFIG=config condor_config_val -v ABC
Not defined: ABC
